[quote=“Tree, post:112, topic:438204”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=540923.msg3968560#msg3968560 date=1333947579]

Tree’s a pimp irl.

ps hai tree long time <3

I’ve missed you Yz.
You never return to me as often as i would like.

How you been mate? It has to be what… 3? 4? years since we’ve been active at the same time. How have you been?
[/quote]

Has it really been that long?! Hahaha fuck, that’s rather depressing for me.
I’ve been we, just working and keeping active. I should have left when you did.
How’s things for you?[/quote]
Time flies huh. Yeah, hahaha. I left right after I resigned from moderator, best decision I ever made. Unfortunately, I feel the need to open this forum growing and growing again. I even installed IRC today… I’m going backwards :S

I’ve been going pretty decent. Looking to make my professional debut in the MX Nationals in Australia maybe towards the end of the year or next year provided I stay injury free. Infact I think the last time I heard was when you left briefly because of losing your moderator job?

[quote=“sinisoul, post:115, topic:438204”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=540923.msg3969740#msg3969740 date=1334030158]
